channel.title: PowerCore Build Log
channel.description: Building AI tools in public. Some ship. Some fail. All documented.

item.title: Launching powercore.app
item.description:
Finally shipping a public hub. This connects GitHub, Hugging Face, Gumroad, and X into one place. No more scattered links. This is step zero.

Used ConvertKit for email capture. RSS feed live. Everything is deliberately minimal.

Next: Post first update thread. Document the next build.

item.title: Fixed Hugging Face username
item.description:
Migrated from archvilefilth to powercoreai. Now everything is under one consistent brand. GitHub stays as ianmxaof since that's my personal account.

Next: Ship the landing page.

item.title: Starting distribution
item.description:
Spent years building without a public surface. That changes now. The plan: build in public, document everything, practice distribution daily.

Distribution isn't "marketing later" â€” it's infrastructure from day one.

Next: Create single canonical link for everything.
